title: Use PEMDAS
text: We must simplify operations in the following order: parentheses, exponents, $$\frac{multiplication}{division}$$ $$(left-to-right)$$, $$\frac{addition}{subttraction}$$ $$(left-to-right)$$.

title: Simplifying the Terms
speech: 10 plus 3 times parentheses 6 minus, 2 times, parentheses 4 minus 2,   minus 2 to the fourth is equal to 10 plus 3 times, parentheses, 6 minus 2 times 2,  minus 2 to the fourth is equal to 10 plus, 3 times, parentheses 6 minus 4,  minus 2 to the fourth is equal to 10 plus 3 times 2 minus 2 to the fourth is equal to, 10 plus 3 times 2 minus 16 is equal to, 10 plus 6 minus 16, is equal to 0
